PaymentCard.description: A payment system issued by a financial instutition to a customer, which allows the cardholder to access funds

companyName.description: Name of a company which employs the bill-to card user

cardHolderName.description: Full name of the person to whom the card was issued, as shown on the card

cardOwnershipType.description: Represents If the card is Primary, Secondary or Authorized

maskedNumber.description: Complete payment credit card number, in masked format

bankIdentificationNumber.description: Usually the first 4 digits of a card number is the Bank Identification Number

numberLastDigits.description: Last 4 digits of the payment card number, in clear text

paymentCardType.description: Defines the type of payment card, such as Visa or Discover

derivedCardTypeCode.description: Stores values similar to payment card type, but is determined by application logic using the the Card BIN

cardToken.description: A number or value generated by the issuer, which serves as a proxy for the actual payment card number

issueNumber.description: A 3 or 4-digit number printed on the back of the payment card

isActive.description: True if the card is currently active and valid, false otherwise

hasExpired.description: True if the payment card has expired, false otherwise

expirationMonth.description: Month of the payment card expiration date

expirationYear.description: Year of the payment card expiration date

billToFirstName.description: First or given name of the person to be billed

billToLastName.description: Last or family name of the person to be billed

billToAddress.description: Billing address for the payment card holder

name.description: Optional display name for the address

addressLine1.description: The first address line can be used by itself for unstructured addresses

addressLine2.description: Optional second line of the address

addressLine3.description: Optional third line of the address

cityName.description: Display name of the city for the address

stateProvinceName.description: Display name of the state or province for the address

stateProvinceCode.description: The ISO region code for the address

countryName.description: Display name of the country for the address

countryCode.description: The ISO country code for the address

postalCodeText.description: The postal code for the address

geoAccuracyCode.description: Provides more information about the latitude and longitude of the address

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

paymentMethodInstance.description: Discriminator property identifying the specific payment method instance type, such as PaymentCard

anyOf.description: The category of payment method, such as payment card, check or digital wallet

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Name of the payment method type

description.description: Longer description of the payment method type

mediaType.description: Type of payment media, such as paper or magnetic card, for the payment method type

requiredIdentificationType.description: Type of identification required for the payment method type

minimumAgeYear.description: Specifies a minimum age requirement for the payment method type

maxTransactionAmount.description: Maximum transaction amount accepted for the payment method type

maxTransactionUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the maximum transaction amount

maxPerPeriodAmount.description: Maximum amount, for all transactions during a transaction period, accepted for the payment method type

maxPerPeriodUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the maximum per period amount

maxPerPeriodTransactionCount.description: Maximum number of transactions accepted during a transaction period for the payment method type

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted
